modName: Natural Water Enhancement And Lighting Redux
summary: Water Modification, changes the water, waterfalls, streams, rivers and rain, lighting and fog
descriptionHtml:
Read the full description before commenting please.
Details and plans for this mods future are below and credits are at the bottom.


No ENB or post process injectors are used in my game, i like them but my pc can\'t handle them.
All the images and videos use my textures, i am aware most of you have some sort of texture mod installed so my mod will vary for each individual.
If it looks good, great stuff, if not send a link to the mod and i will make alternative versions.

This mod aims to take control of the water, lighting, fog and other features of skyrim.
This mod will eventually offers the following.

Natural water replacements for rivers, oceans, lakes, marshes and all with optional added pond features made for certain locations throughout skyrim.

Original in game lighting, weather and fog adjustments that works well with both the water and land for both ENB and non ENB users.

Optional files with different settings for nights, fog and alternate reflections for those who hate the reflection bug but want to keep the sky reflections turned on.

Member/fan requested changes and alterations if i feel it is possible and/or necessary.



This is a work in development, all downloads will be beta versions for testing and feedback.
Please be aware that all mods in development may have a few bugs to fix.
If i fail to fix a bug in future releases, please drop a post with a picture.

Thank you for the support and enjoy.



Release Notes:


Plans for 1.1 ----- Now removed due to update

Set of water variations in riverwood area
If all goes well make plans for my 1.2 release
Rapids and waterfalls


Plans for 1.2 ----- Released

Uexpected merger with Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux
Lighting and fog basic makeover
River edits
Ocean water
Rapids retexture


Plans for 1.3 ----- In production [Look at the images above for how 1.3 should look]

Split files so it\'s no longer an all in one mod
Bloom and depth of field overhaul
Fog corrections near and far
Natural sunny days tweak
Water settings
Color corrections dusk and dawn
Color corrections night


Plans for 1.4 ----- Queued for production

Interior Lighting
Water settings
Rain settings
Snow settings
Lighting fixes
Water fixes
Rapids and waterfalls


Known issues:


Water shadow around player          ------ ISSUE FIXED IN 1.2

Depth of field needs adjustments   ------ In development. 

Bloom needs optimizing                 ------ In development. 

Lighting Makeover                        ------ In development. 

Fog Alterations                            ------ In development. 

Addons ------ Dunno yet, a few ponds maybe as mentioned above.




Credits:

Bethesda for the original work.

Nexus for this great site to share all our fantastic work.

This mod now contains some parts and was re-built into Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux
by SparrowPrince

I have full permission to use and change parts of his work for my work.
This mod when finished will look and feel completely different.
The credits used in his work are below.

SparrowPrince       ----- Main WATER developer.
isoku                    ----- Original implementation and base.
wr_berg                ----- Support and NMM installer.
Gruftlord               ----- General help with various plugin related things I\'m too thick to understand.
elliottgraniteo        ----- For Sir Crabalot.
DeadManPlaying      ----- Managing this mod on Steam.
AstroCat                ----- WATER Developer and support (no longer active).
MontyModMonster  ----- Support (no longer active).
Painkiller97             ----- Lead dragon sarcasm technician.
Brumbek                ----- For use of some meshes for the troughs.
RandomNoob          ----- Scripting advice (module no longer included)
GraceDarkling         ----- Cube map resource.
author: Shockz And SparrowPrince
